name: Trumped Genesis: The Next Generation of Blackjack (Canceled)
blurb: Blackjack-type RPG game where players compete vs. dealer, friends or battle pit bosses to earn rewards, collect items and unlock levels

rewards.reward: Our utmost gratitude for helping develop the most exciting game of the 21st Century!
Free installation of mobile app and 100 extra credits to use and enjoy in the game to help you win rewards, collect items and unlock levels!
Reward 2 (free installation and credits) plus a limited edition wallpaper featuring unique logo design!
Reward 3 plus a free subscription that will let you receive new rewards, items, levels, updates and news as the game continues to get better and better!

Reward 3 plus a free subscription that will let you receive new rewards, items, levels, updates and news as the game continues to get better and better! You will also receive 500 chips to use in the game to help you go all the way!

Reward 3 plus a free subscription that will let you receive new rewards, items, levels, updates and news as the game continues to get better and better!  You will also receive a limited edition customized Genesis t-shirt! (Please add $10 for shipping in the U.S.)

Reward 3 plus a free subscription that will let you receive new rewards, items, levels, updates and news as the game continues to get better and better! You will also receive a limited edition customized Genesis t-shirt! (Please add $10 for shipping in the U.S.). You will also receive a free version of the game for each platform that it is developed on (iPhone, iPad, Android, Windows Phone, DVD, etc)

Want to be remembered forever? Your name will be immortalized for eternity and appear in the game credits as one of the original contributing members!! You will also receive Reward 3 plus a free subscription that will let you receive new rewards, items, levels, updates and news as the game continues to get better and better! You will also receive a limited edition customized Genesis t-shirt! (Please add $10 for shipping in the U.S.)

Your name will appear in the game credits as one of the original contributing members!! You will also receive Reward 3 plus a free subscription and a limited edition customized Genesis t-shirt! (Please add $10 for shipping in the U.S.) You will also receive a free version of the game for each platform that it is developed on (iPhone, iPad, Android, Windows Phone, DVD, etc)

How cool would it be to play the game as yourself? With this pledge, you will receive an in-game avatar based on your name and caricature and will be one of only a handful included that are personalized and available for play. You will also receive Reward 3 plus a free subscription that will let you receive new rewards, items, levels, updates and news as the game continues to get better and better! Your name will also appear in the game credits as one of the original contributing members.

Did you ever want to be the boss? Now you can! The first 10 to pledge will get to be a Pit Boss!! Woohooo! The Pit Boss is the game's most powerful enemy and will be designed in your likeness. Imagine trying to defeat your own character in the ultimate boss battle! You will also get to name your boss: Tom the Terrible, Deb the Destroyer or whatever name you like! You will also receive Reward 6 as a token of our appreciation.In addition, you will also be honored as an original and founding member of the new and exclusive Trumped! VIP Club!

Ok, this is for the serious game collectors! With this pledge you will receive all the goodies through Reward 8, plus a collector's edition of original digital artwork taken straight from the game. A special framed reproduction of the game's logo signed by the artist and developers will be sent to you to show your friends that you were there at the beginning of the next great social game!! Prestige and pride are what this reward is all about so get yourself a keepsake that you can treasure the rest of your life.
